attributes.action: GP’s to take over DWP PIP assessments
attributes.additional_details: I’ve been through appeals and it still got thrown out, how do you suddenly become no longer disabled, as a mother I want justice for my son. He still gets help at college and extra time in his exams, why would he need this if he’s not disabled. Atos healthcare assessed my son wrongly and lied about him, please help the innocent who don’t have the ability to fight, be their voice!
attributes.background: My son aged 19 had been claiming dla since he was 1 year old. He was diagnosed with mild autism, dyslexia and other learning difficulties. He was born prematurely at 33 weeks gestation resulting in his difficulties. Please tell me how do you suddenly become “ not disabled?” Please sign and share.
